outputs.output_descr: End users are provided with technical assisstance, training, incentives and support to identify the areas the technlogies can be improved, install new equipment, capture and recycle refregirent gases etc. Sectors covered include industrial and transport (vehicle retrofitting).

project_descr: To provide incentives for industrial users of chlorofluorocarbon (CFC) to adpot newer technologies that will use less harmful gases with compared to CFC.
project_title: PHASE OUT OF OZONE DEPLETING SUBSTANCES
